title: Botox & Zoom Boom: Has the Pandemic Laid Way for a New Form of Body Dysmorphia?
itunes:title: Botox & Zoom Boom: Has the Pandemic Laid Way for a New Form of Body Dysmorphia?
itunes:subtitle: Are BBLs a thing of the past?
description:
Starting off our episode this week, we talk avocados (and how hard it is to find a ripe one these days), the ethics of eating lab meat and how these new filters on Instagram are having Madz feel some type of way about her 30th birthday. Going into our junior year of the pandemic, we’ve seen a steady rise in cosmetic procedures (ie. filler, Botox, PDO threads, etc) and with Madi's 30th birthday around the corner and with the lines on her face showing, who better to teach her the ways of Botox and cosmetic enhancements than our resident self care and Botox guru: Aleena? Join us this week as we discuss the uptick in certain cosmetic procedures, and how Zoom Boom + a global pandemic may be contributing to the new form of body dysmorphia.



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
